explains: adj. 巴基斯坦的；巴基斯坦人的；巴基斯坦文化的

sentences.en: Workers who went to the Gulf came from the poorest sectors of Pakistani society.
sentences.cn: 去海湾的工人们来自巴基斯坦社会最贫穷的阶层。

sentences.en: "There is no danger of war," Musharraf told reporters in the Pakistani capital of Islamabad.
sentences.cn: 穆沙拉夫在巴基斯坦首都伊斯兰堡对记者说：“没有战争的危险。”

sentences.en: Pakistani soldiers have cleared much of the Swat valley and surrounding areas but they say there are still pockets of resistance.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦士兵已经清除了斯瓦特山谷和周边地区的大部分地区，但是他们说，仍然有零星的抵抗。
